GlossaryMessageTypeCategoryDescription: for APPL 010 and APPL 040 - d001 – d59
Description: Transcripts - Secondary School
Text: - a transcript(s) of your secondary school studies.

GlossaryMessageTypeCategoryDescription: for APPL 010 and APPL 040 - d001 – d59
Description: Transcripts - Secondary School Including Interims
Text: - a transcript(s) of your secondary school studies including interim grades for courses currently in progress.

GlossaryMessageTypeCategoryDescription: for APPL 010 and APPL 040 - d001 – d59
Description: Activity Gap
Text: - a brief outline/timeline of your activities and/or academic transcripts of your studies for the period extending from …………… .

Description: Supplementary Form
Text: - a completed Ryerson Supplementary Form.

Description: Blank Glossary
Text: Blank Glossary

Description: BE001 BEAEROENG
Text: - you are eligible to graduate with your O.S.S.D. with an overall average of at least 80% in six Grade 12 U/M courses including 70% or higher in each of Grade 12 U: Advanced Functions, Calculus & Vectors, Physics, Chemistry, and English.

Description: Warning:  Final Results - To be used with Provincial or International Conditional Offers
Text: Please be advised that you will likely be aware of your final results before they are obtained by Ryerson University.  If you determine that you have not met the conditions of this Offer of Admission, or if you have general questions please contact our of

Description: Mature Student
Text: You have been approved as a Mature Student

Description: Advanced Standing Request Not Granted - Eligible for TCs
Text: Your request for advanced standing admission was taken into consideration but unfortunately, could not be granted.  However, we are pleased to offer you admission to level one with eligibility to apply for individual transfer credits.

Note: Not recommended for use as of January 18, 2017 it is recommended to use use X536 (C through F) series messages instead.
Description: Conditional - Post Secondary with Acceptable Standing
Text: - you successfully complete your current post secondary studies with a good academic standing and submit an official transcript of all final grades.

Note: Not recommended for use as of January 18, 2017 it is recommended to use use X536 (C through F) series messages instead.
Description: Conditional - Post Secondary at ………. with Acceptable Standing
Text: - you successfully complete your current post secondary studies at ………… with a good academic standing and submit an official transcript of all final grades.

Description: Conditional - Post Secondary Eligible to Continue at Institution - new January 18, 2017
Text: - you are eligible to continue at your current post-secondary institution. Any courses attempted prior to the fall 2017 term will be taken into account by Undergraduate Admissions.

Description: Conditional - Post Secondary at ………. Eligible to Continue at Institution new January 18, 2017
Text: - you are eligible to continue at …………...  Any courses attempted prior to the fall 2017 term will be taken into account by Undergraduate Admissions.

Description: Conditional - Post Secondary with CGPA requirement, No Reference to Standing new January 18, 2017
Text: - you are eligible to continue at your current post-secondary institution, and achieve a cumulative grade point average of …… or higher.  Any courses attempted prior to the fall 2017 term will be taken into account by Undergraduate Admissions.

Description: Conditional - Post Secondary at…..... with CGPA requirement No Reference to Standing new January 18, 2017
Text: - you are eligible to continue at ……., and achieve a cumulative grade point average of …… or higher.  Any courses attempted prior to the fall 2017 term will be taken into account by Undergraduate Admissions.

Note: not recommended for use  as of January 18, 2017 it is recommended to use use X536D instead.
Description: Conditional - York University
Text: - you successfully complete your current studies at York University with a good academic standing and submit an official transcript of all final grades.

Note: as of January 20, 2017, not recommended for use. Use X572B, X572C (degree students) or X568B, X568C (for CE) instead
Description: Conditional - Current Ryerson - ?? Average
Text: - you successfully complete your current Ryerson studies with a cumulative grade point average (CGPA) of…… or higher.  Undergraduate Admissions will obtain your grade(s) from Student Records.

Description: British Columbia
Text: - you are eligible to graduate with your British Columbia Certificate of Graduation with an overall average of at least  …… in four academic Grade 12 courses and complete …………… with grade(s) of …… or higher.

Description: International Baccalaureate Diploma (Specify subjects required)
Text:
- you complete your International Baccalaureate Diploma with a total score of …… and grades of four (4) or higher in three Higher Level and three Standard Level subjects, including …………... .


Contact the International Baccalaureate Organization (IBO) to request that an official final transcript be submitted to Ryerson University once final results are available. Please note that IB Higher Level courses with grades of 5 or higher are eligible for transfer credit consideration.

Description: INTERNATIONAL BACCALAUREATE DIPLOMA - BE001
Text: - you complete your International Baccalaureate Diploma with a total score of ……or higher and no grade less than four (4) in three Higher Level and three Standard Level subjects. You must achieve a grade of 4 or higher in each of Mathematics, Physics, Che

Description: Conditional - Transcripts Confirming Information on File
Text: - you submit official transcripts of/from …………… confirming information we have on file.

Description: Transfer Credit not required for Ryerson Courses - Run an Advisement Report (preferred)
Text: Application for transfer credit is not required for Ryerson courses.  Provided you have confirmed your Offer of Admission, paid the required tuition deposit and your Admission file has been Term Activated by Enrolment Services, you will be able to use RAM

Description: Eligible to Apply for Credits - University “C” Grades
Text: You are eligible to apply for/receive transfer credit for university courses in which you have achieved a grade of 60% (C-) or higher.

Description: Eligible to Apply for Transfer Credit (accredited institution)
Text: You may be eligible to apply for transfer credit(s) for courses completed at an accredited institution. Visit ryerson.ca/currentstudents/transfercredits for transfer credit application instructions and deadlines.  We ask that you apply for transfer credit

Description: Eligible to Apply for Transfer credit - Ontario Universities
Text: You may be eligible to apply for transfer credit(s).  Visit ryerson.ca/currentstudents/transfercredits for transfer credit application instructions and deadlines.  We ask that you apply for transfer credits early as the results may impact your course sele

Description: Transfer Credit Information and Forms (general information)
